title: Avatr Poised to Disrupt the Recruitment Industry
description: Avatr is addressing a compelling set up in the employment space. It has massive potential, with a worldwide employment market worth USD$100 trillion, 3.3 billion in workforce, and serviced by a recruitment industry that is USD$700 billion and growing.
